description: 寥寥 means "very few". 寥寥数人 means "very few people". Refers to concise or brief words.

examples.chinese: 虽然只有寥寥数语,但是每一句都气势磅礴
examples.translation: Although only a few words, every sentence is majestic

examples.chinese: 如何用寥寥数语,就能轻易撩动人的情绪
examples.translation: How to easily stir people's emotions with just a few words
A few words, short in length but deep in meaning

examples.chinese: 这篇文章仅用寥寥数语就令人茅塞顿开
examples.translation: This article brings enlightenment with just a few words
